author: Simon Difford
description: Classically made with dry vermouth, this vintage cocktail is so much better with bianco vermouth â€“ in which case, ripe pineapple fruitiness and rye whiskey spice sit harmoniously together with subtle Creole-style adding a delicious finishing touch.
name: Algonquin
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
